TITLE.P: Hire of Plant and Machinery Framework

SHORT_DESCR.P: Carmarthenshire County Council and Pembrokeshire County Council are inviting tenders for the Hire of Plant and Machinery Framework, with and without operators.
Tenders may be submitted for one or more than one lot (no maximum).

TITLE.P: Hire of vehicles and plant with driver / operator

SHORT_DESCR.P: Hire of Plant and Machinery Framework with operator for Carmarthenshire County Council and Pembrokeshire County Council.
Wheeled or Tracked Pavers and Mini Pavers.
Wheeled 180 Mechanical Excavators with Extending Back How "4 in 1" Front Bucket and Pallet Forks.
Flail Type Grass Cutting Machines complete with Tractors.
Tractor Mounted Shredder complete with Tractor.

TITLE.P: Hire of plant without driver / operator

SHORT_DESCR.P: Hire of Plant and Machinery without operator for Carmarthenshire County Council and Pembrokeshire County Council.
Wheeled or Tracked Pavers and Mini Pavers.
Brush cutter with c/w nylon and metal blade.
Low vibration breaker c/w hydraulic power pack and 3 steels and 15m, hose.

TITLE.P: Hire of vehicles and plant with driver / operator
